data.title: Freedom Film Festival: The Holloway File
data.text:
The Holloway File

Russian and Ex-Soviet Union directors: 1,666

Updated 30 November 1998

© Ron Holloway 1999

Please send comments to ron.holloway@cinemafoundation.com

For ease of browsing and searching, this database is formatted as a single document. If you tap the links in the list of countries below, you will go to that section. However, it is not neccesary to know where a director or a film comes from. To search for a director or a film title, just use your browser's Find In Page function to search the entire document.
